languages.text: "А то, что не сделала планета, довели до ума твои собратья. О, как они старались угодить мне и моим спутникам! Как рвали и мучили они себе подобных, чтобы умилостивить меня и моих сестер! Как украшали свою маленькую арену еще живыми мон-кай! Ты думал{mf||а}, что все, что ты видишь вокруг — наших рук дело? Подумай еще раз".

traits.locale_text: "А то, что не сделала планета, довели до ума твои собратья. О, как они старались угодить мне и моим спутникам! Как рвали и мучили они себе подобных, чтобы умилостивить меня и моих сестер! Как украшали свою маленькую арену еще живыми мон-кай! Ты думал{mf||а}, что все, что ты видишь вокруг — наших рук дело? Подумай еще раз".

languages.text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."
languages.original_text: "А то, что не сделала планета, довели до ума твои собратья. О, как они старались угодить мне и моим спутникам! Как рвали и мучили они себе подобных, чтобы умилостивить меня и моих сестер! Как украшали свою маленькую арену еще живыми мон-кай! Ты думал{mf||а}, что все, что ты видишь вокруг — наших рук дело? Подумай еще раз".

traits.locale_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they ripped and tortured their own kin for my and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think it was us who had done everything you see? Then think again."

"And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they ripped and tortured their own kin for my and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think it was us who had done everything you see? Then think again."

"And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they ripped and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with yet living mon-keigh! Did you think it was us who had done everything you see? Think again."

"And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they ripped and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with yet living mon-keigh! Did you think it was us who had done everything you see? Think again."

"And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

"And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

languages.text: 「そして貴様らの同胞は、惑星が始めたことを終わらせたのだ。あぁ、私と仲間達を喜ばせようと、どれほど奮闘してくれたことか！私と仲間達のために、同類を惨殺して苦しめたあの姿！まだ息のあるモン＝ケイで、このささやかな闘技場を彩ったあの姿！目の前のことが全て私達の仕業だと思ったか？よく考えてみろ」
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: 「そして貴様らの同胞は、惑星が始めたことを終わらせたのだ。あぁ、私と仲間達を喜ばせようと、どれほど奮闘してくれたことか！私と仲間達のために、同類を惨殺して苦しめたあの姿！まだ息のあるモン＝ケイで、このささやかな闘技場を彩ったあの姿！目の前のことが全て私達の仕業だと思ったか？よく考えてみろ」

languages.text: “而你的族人完成了接下来的屠杀。噢，为了取悦我和我的随行人员，他们真的非常努力！为了让我和我的姐妹开心，他们那么拼命地折磨、杀戮他们自己的同胞！他们还用那些活着的猴子装点这座小小的竞技场！莫非你真的以为，你眼前看到的一切都是我们造成的吗？再好好想想吧。”
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: “而你的族人完成了接下来的屠杀。噢，为了取悦我和我的随行人员，他们真的非常努力！为了让我和我的姐妹开心，他们那么拼命地折磨、杀戮他们自己的同胞！他们还用那些活着的猴子装点这座小小的竞技场！莫非你真的以为，你眼前看到的一切都是我们造成的吗？再好好想想吧。”

languages.text: « Et vos frères ont tout simplement achevé ce que la planète elle-même avait commencé. Oh, si vous saviez comme ils se sont évertués à s'attirer mes faveurs et celles de mon entourage ! Comme ils ont massacré et torturé leurs semblables pour notre bon plaisir ! Comme ils ont décoré cette petite arène de mon-keigh encore vivants ! Vous pensiez que tout ceci était de notre fait ? Vous avez tort. »
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: « Et vos frères ont tout simplement achevé ce que la planète elle-même avait commencé. Oh, si vous saviez comme ils se sont évertués à s'attirer mes faveurs et celles de mon entourage ! Comme ils ont massacré et torturé leurs semblables pour notre bon plaisir ! Comme ils ont décoré cette petite arène de mon-keigh encore vivants ! Vous pensiez que tout ceci était de notre fait ? Vous avez tort. »

languages.text: «Y tu gente terminó lo que el planeta había empezado. ¡Cómo se esforzaron por agradarnos a mi séquito y a mí! ¡Cómo se masacraban y torturaban entre ellos para deleite de mis hermanas y mío! ¡Cómo decoraban esta pequeña arena con mon-keigh aún vivos! ¿Creías que todo esto era obra nuestra? Pues no».
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: «Y tu gente terminó lo que el planeta había empezado. ¡Cómo se esforzaron por agradarnos a mi séquito y a mí! ¡Cómo se masacraban y torturaban entre ellos para deleite de mis hermanas y mío! ¡Cómo decoraban esta pequeña arena con mon-keigh aún vivos! ¿Creías que todo esto era obra nuestra? Pues no».

languages.text: "Und Eure Brüder haben zu Ende gebracht, was der Planet begonnen hatte. Oh, wie sie sich bemüht haben, mir und meinem Gefolge zu gefallen! Wie sie ihre eigene Sippe abgeschlachtet und gefoltert haben, nur um mich und meine Schwestern zu entzücken! Wie sie diese kleine Arena mit noch lebenden Chem-Pan-Sey dekoriert haben! Dachtet Ihr, alles, was Ihr hier seht, ist das Werk unserer Hände? Falsch gedacht."
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: "Und Eure Brüder haben zu Ende gebracht, was der Planet begonnen hatte. Oh, wie sie sich bemüht haben, mir und meinem Gefolge zu gefallen! Wie sie ihre eigene Sippe abgeschlachtet und gefoltert haben, nur um mich und meine Schwestern zu entzücken! Wie sie diese kleine Arena mit noch lebenden Chem-Pan-Sey dekoriert haben! Dachtet Ihr, alles, was Ihr hier seht, ist das Werk unserer Hände? Falsch gedacht."

languages.text: "Gezegenin başlattığı süreci bitiren de türdeşlerin oldu. Beni ve maiyetimi memnun etmek için nasıl da uğraştılar! Kardeşlerimle birlikte eğlenelim diye kendi hısımlarını nasıl da katlettiler, onlara nasıl da işkence ettiler! Bu minik arenayı hâlâ nefes alan mon-keighler ile nasıl da süslediler! Tüm gördüklerinin bizim eserimiz olduğunu mu sanıyordun yoksa? Bir kez daha düşün derim."
languages.original_text: "And your brethren finished what the planet had started. Oh, how they strived to please me and my entourage! How they slaughtered and tortured their own kin for mine and my sisters' delight! How they decorated this little arena with still living mon-keigh! Did you think all that you see before you is the work of our hands? Think again."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegenin başlattığı süreci bitiren de türdeşlerin oldu. Beni ve maiyetimi memnun etmek için nasıl da uğraştılar! Kardeşlerimle birlikte eğlenelim diye kendi hısımlarını nasıl da katlettiler, onlara nasıl da işkence ettiler! Bu minik arenayı hâlâ nefes alan mon-keighler ile nasıl da süslediler! Tüm gördüklerinin bizim eserimiz olduğunu mu sanıyordun yoksa? Bir kez daha düşün derim."
